```{r, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Read command line arguments
args <- commandArgs(trailingOnly = TRUE)

# Set variables based on passed arguments
path <- args[1]
sampleURL <- args[2]
Name <- args[3]

# Build the full URL for the Search and Download button
search_url <- paste0("https://cephalopodpsg1.shinyapps.io/Dataframe_search/?sample=", sampleURL)
```
